_header: As I lay upon a night
Subjects: Virgin Mary and Joseph; Joseph, father of Jesus; virelais
_description: A song of the Virgin Mary and Joseph — sixteen quatrains (a virelai)

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
As y lay vpon a nyȝty sawe a semely
                    syȝt…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines: …Than mary mysdo woldeAn soo iosep disceyue

NLS18721.First Lines: Als i lay vpon a nithI lokede vpon a stronde…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þat þis sith i say yoreAls i lay on a
                    nyth
